code: import React from"react";import"./TodoForm.css";import{TodoContext}from"../TodoContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoForm(){const{addTodo,setOpenModal}=React.useContext(TodoContext);const[newTodoValue,setNewTodoValue]=React.useState("");const onSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();addTodo(newTodoValue);setOpenModal(false);};const onCancel=event=>{setOpenModal(false);};const onChange=event=>{setNewTodoValue(event.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Escribe tu nuevo TODO"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Cortar cebolla para el almuerzo",value:newTodoValue,onChange:onChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"TodoForm-buttonContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"TodoForm-button TodoForm-button--cancel",onClick:onCancel,children:" Cancel "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"TodoForm-button TodoForm-button--add",children:" New "})]})]});}export{TodoForm};
